content.raw:
In Ian's latest image(#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2132/plot-window-part-2-variable-widgets/diff#comment-14486623):

- I can see the border in the second Dog variable, the fill color looks the same in both to me.
- The first Turtle variable has a border, and I can vaguely tell that their fill color is different.
- In both images, the fill color for Dog and Cat are different than the bigger container's.

In Ian's latest image(#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2132/plot-window-part-2-variable-widgets/diff#comment-14486623):

  • I can see the border in the second Dog variable, the fill color looks the same in both to me.
  • The first Turtle variable has a border, and I can vaguely tell that their fill color is different.
  • In both images, the fill color for Dog and Cat are different than the bigger container's.
